name: Flying Ninja Monster Assassin:City Rescue Battle
name_original: Flying Ninja Monster Assassin:City Rescue Battle
description:
Unleash the power of a flying ninja within you. The monsters of the underworld have escaped & surfaced on the earth in your city. The monsters are freaks of nature made of Fire, Air, Insects & Darkness. They are wrecking a havoc on earth & its your duty to save them because you are the ancient guardian of your dojo & the protector of the city.

Fly around the city fighting monster villains & sending them back to hell. Stop the fire monster from burning the city. Stop the dark lord from leading his army to your city. Every mission, every game level is a new experience you've never had before.
So Shadow Warrior are you ready to use your katana on the evil. Let's go!

Game Features:

* Multiple Monster Genres e.g Fire Monster, Air Monster, Insect Monster & Dark Lord etc
* Best Flying & Fighting Controls
* Different Weapons to Choose From e.g Shuriken, Katana etc.
* Different Missions to Keep User Interest
* Intelligent enemy AI with Attack, Run Away, Player Detect & Attack States
* High Quality Models & Graphics.
